description: This Kotlin source file defines the MainActivity class for an Android app, serving as the main entry point of a single-activity architecture. The activity sets up UI components like the top app bar and bottom navigation, and integrates Android's navigation component for managing navigation graph interactions.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity class extending AppCompatActivity, responsible for setting up navigation and UI components.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and configures navigation components and app bar.

methods.name: onSupportNavigateUp
methods.description: Handles navigation when the up button is pressed, delegating to the NavController.
